attributes.action: Make Menwith Hill Road a 20 mph zone.
attributes.additional_details: As its a 60 mph zone, Its hard for children being a SEN school, sometimes they go near that road and its un-safe, it has 90% fatal chance if we get hit by a normal or intoxicated driver, you also see people going faster than 60mph so its un-safe for children and adults at that matter.
attributes.background: Help with the council to change the road so that its safer for the school students.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
